  • Constructor Details

    • Characters

      public Characters​(java.lang.String name, int hp, int power, int initiative)
      user's constructor of characters
      Parameters:
      name - String : character's name
      hp - int : character's hp, when they pass trough 0, the character die
      power - int : character's power, representing the damage done by the character
      initiative - int : character's initiative, determinate which character attack in first place
